mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, password, username, telephone, email, role, last_login_time, specialty, office, qiniu_id, type) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{username}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{role}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{specialty}, #{office}, #{qiniuId}, #{type});
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, qiniu_id = #{qiniuId}, password = #{password}, telephone = #{telephone}, email = #{email}, role = #{role}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, specialty = #{specialty}, office = #{office}, type = #{type} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, u.username as username, telephone as telephone, email as email, office as office, specialty as specialty, type as type, q.qiniu_id as qiniuId, bucket as bucket from user u, qiniu q where u.user_id = #{id} and q.qiniu_id = u.qiniu_id
